Package jMidiSequencerBeta.model

Class JMidiTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • jMidiSequencerBeta.model.JMidiTrack
  • public class JMidiTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Represents a collection of related Midi Events organized in a grid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      JMidiTrack​(JVirtualInstrument instrument)
      Constructs a for the specified instrument.

                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        newPitch - the pitch you want to update to.
        newTick - the tick you want to update to.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it collides with other in the region or there is no such event.
